metadata.title: CVE-2024-50235 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  wifi: cfg80211: clear wdev->cqm_config pointer on free  When we free wdev->cqm_config when unregistering, we also need to clear out the pointer since the same wdev/netdev may get re-registered in another network namespace, then destroyed later, running this code again, which results in a double-free.
